#summary Autowired of WindowFocusListener
#labels Phase-Implementation

= Introduction =

_See [http://java.sun.com/javase/6/docs/api/java/awt/event/WindowFocusListener.html]_

= Details =

* WindowFocusListener.windowGainedFocus
  Invoked when the Window is set to be the focused Window, which means that the Window, or one of its subcomponents, will receive keyboard events.
  
{{{
void on[ComponentName]_windowGainedFocus(WindowEvent e) {}
}}} 
     
* WindowFocusListener.windowLostFocus
  Invoked when the Window is no longer the focused Window, which means that keyboard events will no longer be delivered to the Window or any of its subcomponents
 
{{{             
void on[ComponentName]_windowLostFocus(WindowEvent e) 
}}}
